definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Hages Andover's option to buying this property is gonna expire by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 銀行對於這處房產的購置權月底就要失效了。

sentences.english: A local real estate company plastic company personal transport majority.
sentences.chinese: 本地有房產公司塑料公司個人用車居多。

sentences.english: The property right need to be very clearly and blench of the pawn of bank.
sentences.chinese: 房產產權清晰，儘量迴避銀行抵押物業。

sentences.english: House repossessions rise as borrowers lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 銀行收回抵押房產的情況上升，而貸款者失去了工作。

sentences.english: Third, Huns have a 20% faster production bonus for their stables.
sentences.chinese: 第三，匈奴的馬房產馬速度較其它文明快20%。

sentences.english: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.chinese: 你必須將該處房產的資本增值考慮在內。

sentences.english: Now the price of house is very cheep.
sentences.chinese: 現在房產價格實在是非常便宜。

sentences.english: I've come to reclaim my property, " she announced to the desk clerk."
sentences.chinese: 䵑“我來要求歸還我的房產，”她向接待人員宣佈。

sentences.english: If how want house property transfer ownership to deal with to filial body directly?
sentences.chinese: 假如直接把房產過戶到子女身上要如何辦理？

sentences.english: The data were collected in the housing property Bureau of Wuhan by questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 數據集來源於武漢房產局的住房調查數據。

sentences.english: You just bought a house in L. A. What's it like?
sentences.chinese: 你剛在洛杉磯購買了一套房產，它是什麼樣子的？

sentences.english: Joe Cole was one of the few who got out in time.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾是及少數及時逃出房產泡沫的投資人之一。

sentences.english: Across America, high-end real estate is in a deep funk.
sentences.chinese: 美國各地的高端房產都深陷低迷。

sentences.english: The real estate agency says if I pay a 20% down payment, I can move in at once.
sentences.chinese: 房產商說如果我首付20%房款就可以馬上人住。

sentences.english: Therefore, the property should belong to the common property of husband and wife.
sentences.chinese: 因此，該房產應該屬於夫妻的共同財產。

sentences.english: When the lease ends, the property reverts to the freeholder.
sentences.chinese: 租期結束後，該房產會歸還給其終身所有者。
